overview:
Brock S. Masterson is the Co-Founder of Swindlr which will launch it’s first product Zappn in 2010.

Mr. Masterson graduated from Southern Illinois University with a BA in Mass Communications. He has overseen small scale film projects and, in early 2004, founded Studio Glockenspiel, a media production company. Later in 2004, Brock was hired by Apple Inc. to help lead Apple’s new ProCare initiative where he remained until the forming of Swindlr LLC in 2009.Â  Also in 2009, Brock was brought aboard dressquest.com to reorganize and launch the five year old start-up, which heÂ  successfully saw through in early 2010.Â  Mr. Masterson directs all internal people and projects including day to day activities for Swindlr LLC.
